Uses of Class
io.netty.util.Signal

  • Packages that use Signal 
    Package Description
    io.netty.channel
    The core channel API which is asynchronous and event-driven abstraction of various transports such as a NIO Channel.
    io.netty.util
    Utility classes used across multiple packages.

    • Uses of Signal in io.netty.channel

      Fields in io.netty.channel declared as Signal 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static Signal ChannelInboundMessageHandlerAdapter.ABORT
      Thrown by ChannelInboundMessageHandlerAdapter.messageReceived(ChannelHandlerContext, Object) to abort message processing.
      protected static Signal ChannelOutboundMessageHandlerAdapter.ABORT
      Thrown by ChannelOutboundMessageHandlerAdapter.flush(ChannelHandlerContext, Object) to abort message processing.

    • Uses of Signal in io.netty.util

      Methods in io.netty.util with parameters of type Signal 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Signal.expect(Signal signal)
      Check if the given Signal is the same as this instance.
